name: Pipes & Presses (gergela)
description:
Pipes & Presses was developed for a one button game jam. The goal of the game is the lead colored ball through a series of intersections in order to reach the matching goals.

Controls: Press spacebar to move the intersections, hold spacebar to speed up the balls.

Developed by: Andy and Austin

Music by: Moonbeau

Game font by Typodermic Fonts

Made in Unity
